item.title: Apple Hiring for 'Answers' Team Working on 'ChatGPT-Like Search'
item.description: Apple is hiring engineers for an “Answers, Knowledge, and Information” team that is working on improving Siri, Spotlight, Safari, and more. As of writing, Apple’s careers website has more than a dozen
